expo.name: Public Healthcare Mobile Outreach Information Management System
expo.description: A comprehensive mobile application for primary healthcare outreach and patient management in rural and remote areas.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PHMOS needs camera access to capture patient photos and medical documentation for healthcare records.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: PHMOS needs microphone access to record voice notes and audio documentation for patient care.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: PHMOS needs location access to track outreach visits and provide location-based healthcare services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: PHMOS needs location access to track outreach visits and provide location-based healthcare services.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PHMOS needs photo library access to attach medical images and documentation to patient records.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: PHMOS needs permission to save medical photos and documentation to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: PHMOS needs contacts access to easily add patient contact information and emergency contacts.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: PHMOS needs calendar access to schedule and manage patient appointments and healthcare visits.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: PHMOS needs reminders access to set medication and appointment reminders for patients.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: PHMOS needs Bluetooth access to connect with medical devices and health monitoring equipment.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: PHMOS needs Bluetooth access to communicate with medical devices for patient monitoring.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: PHMOS uses Face ID for secure authentication to protect sensitive patient health information.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: PHMOS needs notification access to send appointment reminders and important health alerts.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: PHMOS needs access to read health data to provide comprehensive patient care and monitoring.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: PHMOS needs access to update health data with patient vitals and medical information.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: PHMOS needs motion access to track healthcare worker activity during outreach visits.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: PHMOS needs speech recognition to transcribe voice notes and medical documentation.
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: PHMOS needs local network access to sync data with nearby medical devices and systems.
